question: “MITRA SHAKTI 2019” which was recently organized in Pune, was the joint military & Army exercise of India and which of the following countries?
explanation: “MITRA SHAKTI 2019” was recently organized in Pune (Aundh Military Station), Maharashtra. It is the joint military & Army exercise of India and Sri Lanka. The event of 2019 was the 7th edition of this exercise.
